item.title: Sentiment Analysis on Twitter
item.description: Introduction Hey there, fellow data nerds! Today we’re going to dive into the world of brand sentiment analysis using Twitter’s API. Strap on your thinking caps and let’s get started! First things first, what is brand sentiment analysis? Simply put, it’s the process of determining how people feel about a particular brand or product by analyzing their social media interactions. By examining tweets, comments, and other online chatter, we can get a sense of whether people are generally positive, negative, or neutral towards a brand.
